程序包 display

类 GameApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • display.GameApp
  • public class GameApp
extends java.lang.Object
    Display different game level by using ActorFactory.
    Besides, this class also display End, HealthPoint and Score
    作者:
    scyyz4

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明

      The health.
      static javafx.stage.Stage stage
      The stage.

      构造器 说明

      Instantiates a new game app.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void createEasyWorld​(GameStage bg, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Generates the easy world based current GameStage and Stage.
      void createNewWorld​(GameStage bg2, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Generates the secret world based current GameStage and Stage.
      void createNormalWorld​(GameStage bg, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Generates the normal world based current GameStage and Stage.
      void endAndDigit​(GameStage bg)
      Display the element End and score in game stage.
      void healthPoint​(GameStage bg)
      Display the health point.
      void stageDisplay​(GameStage bg, javafx.stage.Stage stage, java.lang.String music)
      Display time bar, animal and play corresponding music.

        Instantiates a new game app.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createEasyWorld

        public void createEasyWorld​(GameStage bg,
                            javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Generates the easy world based current GameStage and Stage.
        参数:
        bg - Current background
        stage - Current stage

      • createNormalWorld

        public void createNormalWorld​(GameStage bg,
                              javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Generates the normal world based current GameStage and Stage.
        参数:
        bg - Current background
        stage - Current stage

      • createNewWorld

        public void createNewWorld​(GameStage bg2,
                           javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Generates the secret world based current GameStage and Stage.
        参数:
        bg2 - Current background
        stage - Current stage

      • stageDisplay

        public void stageDisplay​(GameStage bg,
                         javafx.stage.Stage stage,
                         java.lang.String music)
        Display time bar, animal and play corresponding music.

        For the time bar, if the player have not won the game before time consumed,
        an alert will be displayed to remind him process up the process.

        参数:
        bg - Current background
        stage - Current stage
        music - Music played in corresponding level

      • endAndDigit

        public void endAndDigit​(GameStage bg)
        Display the element End and score in game stage.
        参数:
        bg - Current background

      • healthPoint

        public void healthPoint​(GameStage bg)
        Display the health point. For each players, they will have five times to try this game everytime.
        参数:
        bg - Current background
